Our works

  • Photography

  • Rendering

  • MILK Photoshoop

    A photoshoot for the MILK studio using triangular packing tubes.

  • Gender Identity

    This photo represents what the ideals of gender idenity are for women in modern western society. We teach these ideals to children from a young age.

  • Cotton Candy Skyscraper

    After being tasks with designing a skyscraper out of an innappropriate building material, I came up and modeled a skyscraper made of cotton candy.

  • 3D Monkey

    3D Monkey made out of wire, pipe cleaners, and pearler beads

  • The Yellow Wallpaper

    A piece about a young, mentally ill woman who while trapped in her house is slowly starting to tear it apart.

  • Lables

    A theoretical design for a interative instilation piece. Particpants get to write on a label and stick it on the clear box to reprsent the labels that are put on us as human beings.
